net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Image
      • java.awt.image.BufferedImage
        • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.RenderedImage, java.awt.image.WritableRenderedImage, java.awt.Transparency, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Sprite
extends java.awt.image.BufferedImage
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A wrapper class for BufferedImage that contains multiple methods for advanced color manipulation.
    Since:
    Apr 15, 2015, 12:22:40 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander
